To create a portable distribution of that you can keep on an USB stick:
Go to www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Editor/Windows/VM/oxygen.ziphttp://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Author/Windows/VM/oxygenAuthor.ziphttp://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Developer/Windows/VM/oxygenDeveloper.zip and save the ZIP archive on your disk.The ZIP includes a Windows Java Virtual Machine.
Unpack the ZIP and copy the license.txt file to the unpacked directory.
Use oxygenoxygenAuthoroxygenDeveloper.exe to start the application.
